name: Q´OCINA EN CASA GREEN SOFRITO CULINARY BASE US  BOX 1 X 50gr
description: Sofrito culinary bases made with all-natural Peruvian-grown fresh vegetables, using professional techniques commonly found in fine dining restaurants  (cooking, sauteing, caramelization, etc.). These preparations can then be used to make a wide variety of delicious dishes.Sofrito culinary bases developed by Gastón Acurio using Fuxion technology to make them healthier—free of preservatives and artificial colors or flavors.
slogans: RICO, FÁCIL Y SANO
Coriander+ Yellow Peruvian Chili Pepper+ Loche Squash+ Chicha de Jora Reduction+ Red Onion+ Garlic+ Salt+ Pepper+ Cumin
benefits: Benefits: BenefitsQ’ocina en Casa Green Sofrito Culinary Base helps you cook delicious, easy, and healthy meals:- Delicious: Developed by Gastón and his team of chefs using secret processes to guarantee unbeatable flavor.- Easy: Save time in the kitchen! Q’ocina en Casa’s team of chefs chop, fry, and process everything for you, so you can use our sofrito culinary base right out of the package. All you have to do is add vegetables according to your preferred recipe.- Healthy: Our freeze-drying process preserves the vegetables’ natural flavors and aromas. That’s why they have no preservatives or artificial colors and flavors.
usage_suggestion: Instructions: InstructionsRehydrate the culinary base with water, according to the recipe of your choice. You can use the entire contents of the packet when cooking for four, or add to taste to give your homemade meals a special touch.

Bioactive Collagen Peptides I & III + Hyaluronic acid + Coenzyme Q10 + Biotin + Antioxidants + Tropical Super Fruits + Vitamins
benefits: Benefits: BenefitsBeauty-Inprovides optimal cellular nutrition to the inner layers of the skin. It promotes the regeneration of the collagen and elastin of the dermis, providing greater elasticity and texture to the skin; as well as greater firmness and hydration; what helps slow the appearance of the signs of aging.
usage_suggestion: Instructions: InstructionsDissolve the content of one (1) stick in a glass of cold water and mix well. Keep in a dry, cool place.Suggested useTake one or two sticks per day, preferable before going to bed.

name: FUXION CAFÉ & CAFÉ FIT  BOX 28 x 5 gr
description: Irresistible roasted gourmet coffee with green coffee extract, rich in chlorogenic acids that help you to control your appetite and reduce your waistline. Its antioxidant components will also help you to reduce your appetite, boost the elimination of cellulite, specifically eliminating accumulated fat.
slogans: ¡DATE UN GUSTO SIN PERDER LA LÍNEA!
Roasted Coffee + Green Coffee
benefits: Benefits: BenefitsCAFÉ & CAFÉ FIThelps reduce appetite naturally. It contains Svetol, patented formulation of chlorogenic acids extracted from green coffee beans, that favor the regulation of blood sugar levels and reduce the feeling of fatigue.
usage_suggestion: Instructions: InstructionsDissolve the content of one (1) stick in a cup of hot water and mix well. Keep in a dry, cool place.Suggested useTake two sticks per day, as a snack between meals (to control your appetite).

name: FUXION GANOMAS CAPPUCCINO  BOX 28 x 7.5 gr
description: Imagine relaxing with a good book, sipping on a cappuccino, and knowing that it is packed with a shield to safeguard your wellness. Gano+ is a delicious cappuccino coffee drink made with Ganoderma Lucidum extract (reishi mushroom), loaded with antioxidants and micronutrients that may help improve your overall health.
slogans: ¡TU SALUD GANA MÁS CON GANOMÁS!
Ganoderma Lucidum Extract + Micronutrients + Non-dairy Cream + Skim milk

usage_suggestion: Instructions: InstructionsDissolve the content of one (1) stick in a cup of hot water and mix well. Keep in a dry, cool place.Suggested useTake two sticks per day, at any time.

name: FUXION BERRY BALANCE  BOX 28 x 5 gr
description: Delicious drink based on a mix of berry extracts which are rich in proanthocyanidins, enriched with pineapple infusion and probiotic cultures that help preserve a healthy urinary tract.
slogans: ¡DISFRUTA DE UNA VIDA PLENA HOY!
Cranberry Extract + Acerola + Acai Berry + Camu-Camu + Blackberry + Strawberry + Cherry + Probiotic Cultures + Pineapple Skin + Calcium + Anthocianyns + Vitamins (C & E)

usage_suggestion: Instructions: InstructionsDissolve the content of one (1) stick in a glass of cold water and mix well. Keep in a dry, cool place.Suggested useTake one or two sticks per day, at any time. For best results drink between meals, on an empty stomach.

name: FUXION PROTEIN ACTIVE FIT - VANILLA & CANELA  CAJA 14 x 25 gr
description: Active protein of 100% vegetable origin and high bioavailability, enhanced with Malabar Tamarind, L-Carnitine, B Complex, Chromium and Zinc in organic molecule, to accelerate your metabolism and promote fat burning with its low-calorie formula, allergen-free and of high biological value. Thanks to the combination of its sprouted ingredients, your body will receive the intact nutrients that each component offers.
slogans: ¡MEJORA TU NUTRICIÓN Y REDUCE MEDIDAS!
PEA PROTEIN + SPROUTED RICE PROTEIN + SPROUTED QUINOA + COCONUT OIL + CONJUGATED LINOLEIC ACID (CLA) + DIGESTIVE ENZYMES + GREEN COFFEE EXTRACT
benefits: Benefits: BenefitsIn addition, it will help you:- Control your weight and reduce measures, while toning muscles (*).- Optimally assimilate essential amino acids, which will allow your body to achieve a better tone.- Reduce the cravings sensation thanks to the vegetable protein, which you will assimilate quicker and more effectively.- Reduce health risks (**).(*) Along with a balanced diet and exercise.(**) Overweight is considered a risk factor for various diseases.

Keep in a cool, dry place.Suggested useTake two sachets per day, as a snack between meals (to complete five meals per day).  Drink it as a shake (just with water), or a smoothie (with frozen fruit).

name: FUXION ALPHA BALANCE  BOX 28 x 5 gr
description: Healthy drink based on green vegetables rich in chlorophyll which promote the balance of pH levels in the body. It is done by cleaning and detoxifying the body, then discarding the toxins obtained by having a poor diet, over indulgences, pollution or from dealing with stress.

Chlorella + Spiruline + Alfalfa + Spinach + Wheatgrass + Ginger + Green Apple + Vitamins + Minerals (Magnesium & Zinc)

For better results drink it in the morning, when you wake up, or at breakfast with your favorite vegetable or fruit juice.

name: FUXION OFF  BOX 28 x 5 gr
description: Delicious nutritious drink made of essential amino acids that act on the brain to keep it relaxed, focused and positive. These amino acids, in combination with Amalaki and Ashwagandha extracts, complex B vitamins and minerals, contribute to a better neuronal nutrition, to balance the nervous system and optimize the natural processes of relaxation, without producing drowsiness.

ESSENTIAL AMINO ACIDS (L- THEANINE, GLYCINE, TRIPOPATHAN) + SUPER FRUITS EXTRACT (ASHWAGANDHA, AMALAKI AND LIME) + MAGNESIUM IN ORGANIC MOLECULE + COMPLEX B VITAMINS

Probiotic Fiber + Vitamins + Minerals

description: First active, 100% vegetable-origin protein, highly bioavailable and highly digestible that perfectly complements your daily diet to obtain a bulletproof health.
